TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppDomainManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供非托管宿主的托管等效项。

span.span: Provides a managed equivalent of an unmanaged host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用 在 ASP.NET 中配置应用程序域。Do not use to configure an application domain in ASP.NET. 在 ASP.NET 中，必须由主机处理配置。In ASP.NET, configuration must be handled by the host. 通过实现 类，宿主应用程序可以参与创建新的应用程序域。Implementing the class enables a hosting application to participate in the creation of new application domains. 若要替换默认值 ，请在 APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM 和 APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE 环境变量中标识替换项的程序集和类型 ，或 [\](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element) 使用 [\](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element) 配置文件中的和元素。To replace the default , identify the assembly and type of the replacement in the APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM and APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE environment variables, or use the [\](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element) and [\](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element) elements in your configuration file. 该程序集必须是完全受信任的，并且包含在全局程序集缓存或启动应用程序的目录中。The assembly must be fully trusted and be contained in the global assembly cache or the directory of the starting application. 在环境变量中必须完全限定类型名称和程序集名称。The type and assembly names must be fully qualified in the environment variables. 例如：For example: `set APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE=MyNamespace.TestAppDomainManager` `set APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM=customappDomainmanager, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=f1368f7b12a08d72` > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果包含的子类的程序集 依赖于使用条件 (APTCA) 特性标记的程序集，则必须将这些程序集包含在传递到 用于创建应用程序域的属性的列表中。If the assembly that contains your subclass of depends on assemblies that are marked with the conditional (APTCA) attribute, you must include those assemblies in the list that you pass to the property of the you use to create application domains. 否则，将禁用用条件 APTCA 特性标记的程序集。Otherwise, the assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute will be disabled. 是非托管宿主的托管等效项。The is the managed equivalent of the unmanaged host. 对象参与在进程中创建新的应用程序域，并可以在 运行其他托管代码之前自定义新的。An object participates in the creation of new application domains in a process and can customize the new before other managed code runs. 还可以提供参与公共语言运行时执行的其他方面的主机管理器。The can also supply host managers that participate in other aspects of common language runtime execution. 例如， 可以标识 参与应用程序域的安全决策的对象。For example, an can identify a object that participates in the security decisions of the application domain. > [!NOTE] > 仅授予的程序集 `FullTrust` （例如全局程序集缓存中的程序集或在方法中标识为的程序集） `fullTrustAssemblies` 可以在 构造函数和方法中加载 。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含类级别的链接要求和继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 当直接调用方或派生类没有基础结构权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅 [链接要求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) 和 [继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示的实现非常简单 。The following example shows a very simple implementation of . [!code-csharp[System.AppDomainManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/CS/customAppDomainManager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomainManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/VB/customAppDomainManager.vb#1)]

exception.span: 调用方没有正确的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permissions.
See the Requirements section.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 仅授予的程序集 `FullTrust` （例如全局程序集缓存中的程序集或在方法中标识为的程序集） `fullTrustAssemblies` 可以在 构造函数和方法中加载 。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method.

summary.span: 获取应用程序激活器，该激活器用于激活相应域中的外接程序和基于清单的应用程序。

span.span: Gets the application activator that handles the activation of add-ins and manifest-based applications for the domain.
The application activator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个中，有一个类的单个指定实例， 所有加载项和基于清单的应用程序激活调用都路由到该实例。There is a single designated instance of the class in each to which all add-in and manifest-based application activation calls are routed. 当前的 可以提供自己的自定义 ，或创建默认的实例 。The for the current can provide its own custom , or an instance of the default is created.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CheckSecuritySettings(class System.Security.SecurityState state) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CheckSecuritySettings (state As SecurityState) As Boolean
public: virtual bool CheckSecuritySettings(System::Security::SecurityState ^ state);
abstract member CheckSecuritySettings : System.Security.SecurityState -> bool override this.CheckSecuritySettings : System.Security.SecurityState -> bool

param.name: state
param.span: 的一个子类，用来标识请求其安全状态的操作。

span.span: A subclass of that identifies the operation whose security status is requested.

summary.span: 指示是否允许在应用程序域中执行指定的操作。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified operation is allowed in the application domain.

returns.span: 如果宿主允许在应用程序域中执行 指定的操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the host allows the operation specified by to be performed in the application domain; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现返回 `false` 。The default implementation of this method returns `false`. 调用方法以增加独立存储配额时，将调用此方法。This method is called when the method has been called to increase the isolated storage quota. 托管公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的应用程序可以重写 方法，以根据 继承) 的对象 (执行策略决策 ，然后可以允许或阻止增加。An application that hosts the common language runtime (CLR) can override the method to perform policy decisions based on an object (which inherits ), and can then allow or prevent the increase. 例如，主机可能会提示最终用户批准或拒绝增加配额的请求。For example, a host could prompt the end user to approve or deny the request to increase the quota. 主机的实现应考虑 拒绝服务攻击的可能性。The host's implementation of should take into account the possibility of denial-of-service attacks. 例如，只有在用户启动的事件（例如按钮单击）中调用方法时，才应提示用户。For example, it should prompt the user only if the method is called from a user-initiated event such as a button click.

returns.span: 新的或现有的应用程序域。

span.span: A new or existing application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由参数指定的友好名称 `friendlyName` 可在用户界面中显示以标识域。The friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 默认 方法调用受保护的 方法来创建 。The default method calls the protected method to create the . 此方法的重写不需要调用方法， 但可以返回现有域。Overrides of this method do not need to call the method but can return an existing domain.

para.span: 当从 类继承并重写 方法时，可以在调用方法之前执行自定义应用程序域初始化活动 ，或者根本不调用帮助程序方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and override the method, you can perform custom application domain initialization activities before calling the method, or not call the helper method at all.

para.span: 例如，你可以修改作为传入的证据 ，更新关联的字段 ，或重复使用现有域。

span.span: For example, you could modify the evidence passed in as , update the fields of the associated , or reuse an exiting domain.

summary.span: 提供帮助器方法以创建一个应用程序域。

span.span: Provides a helper method to create an application domain.
A newly created application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此受保护的帮助器方法会处理新的应用程序域的创建。This protected helper method handles the creation of a new application domain. 此友好名称由 `friendlyName` 参数指定，可在用户界面中显示以标识域。This friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

span.span: is .

.property instance class System.Reflection.Assembly EntryAssembly
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property EntryAssembly As Assembly
public: virtual property System::Reflection::Assembly ^ EntryAssembly { System::Reflection::Assembly ^ get(); };
member this.EntryAssembly : System.Reflection.Assembly

summary.span: 获取应用程序的入口程序集。

span.span: Gets the entry assembly for an application.

value.span: 应用程序的入口程序集。

span.span: The entry assembly for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序是清单激活的应用程序，则会从应用程序清单确定条目程序集。If the application is a manifest-activated application, the entry assembly is determined from the application manifest. 如果应用程序未激活清单，则入口程序集是默认应用程序域中的进程可执行文件。If the application is not manifest activated, the entry assembly is the process executable in the default application domain. 在其他应用程序域中，入口程序集是方法执行的第一个可执行文件 。In other application domains, the entry assembly is the first executable that was executed by the method.

The host security manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许主机提供 以参与应用程序域的安全决策。This property allows a host to provide a to participate in the security decisions for the application domain. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 自定义应用程序域管理器的属性的重写。The following example shows an override of the property for a custom application domain manager. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Public Overridable Sub InitializeNewDomain (appDomainInfo As AppDomainSetup)

param.name: appDomainInfo
param.span: 包含应用程序域初始化信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains application domain initialization information.
Initializes the new application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用此方法初始化 ASP.NET 中的应用程序域。Do not use this method to initialize an application domain in ASP.NET. 在 ASP.NET 中，必须由主机处理配置。In ASP.NET, configuration must be handled by the host. 如果使用此方法初始化应用程序域，则在 尝试初始化应用程序域时，主机将引发。If you use this method to initialize the application domain, the host throws when it attempts to initialize the application domain. 异常消息指示已进行了初始化。The exception message indicates that initialization has already occurred. 此方法在构造函数之后立即调用。This method is called immediately after the constructor. 默认 实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing. 自定义实现可以设置内部类和委托，设置具有非托管主机接口的接口，或设置新的事件处理程序 。A custom implementation can set up internal classes and delegates, set up an interface with the unmanaged host interface, or set up event handlers for the new . 此外，对于外接程序激活，自定义实现可将当前标识 为目标应用程序域。Also, for add-in activations, a custom implementation could identify the current as the target application domain. 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，可以使用此方法在应用程序启动时将默认应用程序域沙盒，或修改新应用程序域的沙箱。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you can use this method to sandbox the default application domain at application startup, or to modify the sandbox of a new application domain. 为此，请在 `appDomainInfo` 初始化应用程序域之前，调整分配给的属性的对象的和属性。To do this, adjust the and properties on the object that is assigned to the property of `appDomainInfo`, before you initialize the application domain. > [!NOTE] > 仅授予的程序集 `FullTrust` （例如全局程序集缓存中的程序集或在方法中标识为的程序集） `fullTrustAssemblies` 可以在 构造函数和方法中加载 。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 对自定义应用程序域管理器的方法的重写。The following example shows an override of the method for a custom application domain manager. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomainManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/CS/customAppDomainManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomainManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/VB/customAppDomainManager.vb#2)]
